task: Develop a basic 'Jet Set Radio' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Look closely at the most embarrassing details and amplify them'.
name: Graffiti Gaffe Grind

branding_data.short_description: Graffiti Gaffe Grind is a vibrant skating game where players amplify their mistakes for style points.
branding_data.detailed_description: In Graffiti Gaffe Grind, players navigate a colorful urban landscape on rollerblades, tagging walls with graffiti while performing daring tricks. Inspired by 'Jet Set Radio', the game encourages players to embrace their blunders. Amplifying embarrassing details, such as stumbling or awkward landings, becomes a core mechanic, rewarding players with style points for turning mistakes into creative flair. The game features a dynamic soundtrack and a variety of levels filled with obstacles, ramps, and graffiti challenges. Players can customize their characters and graffiti styles, all while exploring the vibrant cityscape.

strategy: Look closely at the most embarrassing details and amplify them
